title: Challenge-Based Blended Learning for Solving Global Sustainability Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics and foundational concepts related to sustainability
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where learners from diverse professional backgrounds (medical/legal/technical) collaborate to solve real-world global sustainability challenges

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world sustainability issues and propose solutions using mathematical modeling techniques.
Learners can complete a project addressing sustainability challenges by collaborating with international/interdisciplinary team members in a blended learning environment.
Learners can communicate effectively and share knowledge in a hybrid classroom using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
